title: Stoners are among the worst kind of people
body:
So ever since one of my friends started smoking the wacky tobaccy, he's been really.. How to put it.. Well, stupid. He doesn't pay attention to shit anymore, he doesn't remember stuff you just told him 5 minutes ago, shit like that. Like, just now he wanted me to play some Halo 5 with him, and I'm like yeah sure man. But then we go to play, the match starts, and he's not moving at all. I tell him the match started, and he's like yeah yeah in a minute I'm just smoking a bowl. Meanwhile the score is already 22 - 5 for the enemy. So I just quit out and shut off my Xbox.

Like, fuck, guys. Stoners are so annoying to interact with. Why the fuck are they like this?
